Electronic Annex EA-3: Properties the V+L+H surface. Pressure and compositions are from the companion paper (Driesner und Heinrich, GCA, 2007). Data are given in 10C intervals from 30C to 790C. V denotes vapor, L liquid. rho is density and h specific enthalpy.
